column4: an aide told CNN.The PDB is a daily rundown of threats and intelligence developments compiles by the national security community. The top secret document is read by the president and his inner circle of security advisers and top White House officials and is often accompanied by an in-person briefing by intelligence officials.Trump received his first classified national security briefing in August after he became the Republican nominee
column5: and less than a month later
column6: received a second briefing at his request. Despite those briefings
column7: Trump continued to doubt the US intelligence community's conclusions that Russia orchestrated a series of hacks aimed at Democratic Party officials and organizations in the midst of the US election.Trump will continue to receive the PDB daily through his presidency.	Donald Trump receives first President's Daily Brief
